official_title: Impact of Automated Telephone Outreach on Colorectal Cancer Screening Uptake Among Patients Who Receive Mailed Fecal Immunochemical Tests (FIT)
inclusion_criteria:
* Overdue for average-risk colorectal cancer screening
* Active primary care provider at UCLA seen within last 3 years
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Inactive mychart status at time of enrollment
* Died within follow-up period
* Received FIT kit in prior 6 months
